analysis.description:
CryptoPhoenixesCivilWar.setPhoenixOwners (/unique_chucks/6/0x66e2c30609e9661f52e5d46e1f0f2e6955fda71e.sol#302-314) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(PHOENIXES[0].previousOwner == address(0))
CryptoPhoenixesCivilWar.DENOMINATOR should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0x66e2c30609e9661f52e5d46e1f0f2e6955fda71e.sol#130)

Pausable.unpause (/unique_chucks/6/0x66e2c30609e9661f52e5d46e1f0f2e6955fda71e.sol#77-83) should be declared external
